text: Three 3D8 scFv TG mouse lines and the wild - type C57BL / 6 line were divided into five groups with or without PRV infection ( WT - mock , WT - PRV , STG69 - PRV , STG90 - PRV , and STG135 - PRV ) . Mice were challenged with PRV by intramuscular injection ( 10 LD 50 ) . Survival rates in each group were calculated at 12 hr intervals ( Figure S5 ) . Tissues ( muscle and brain ) were harvested and stored at 270uC for further RT - PCR and immunohistochemical analyses .
